channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI voice company Hyper raises $6.3M to help automate 911 calls
item.description: Hyper hopes to use the fresh capital to help scale across the country, integrate more into existing 911 systems, hire a head of engineering, and build...

item.title: OpenAI's New CEO of Applications Strikes Hyper-Optimistic Tone in First Memo to Staff
item.description: Ex-Instacart CEO Fidji Simo sent a memo to staff Monday laying out her vision for how AI will change the world.

item.title: How WIRED Analyzed the Epstein Video
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we dive into the differences between what the US government said about a Jeffrey Epstein video it released and the ...

item.title: Grok’s AI companions drove downloads, but its latest model is the one making money
item.description: Given Grok's expensive new subscription offering, timed alongside the Grok 4 launch, it's not surprising to see that even a smaller increase in the nu...

item.title: Hisense U8QG TV Review: Beautifully Bright, Tough to Tame
item.description: Hisense's latest U8 TV serves up a brightness bonanza, but it's not for the timid.

item.title: Chrome for iOS makes it easier to switch between work and personal Google accounts
item.description: When users sign in or switch to their work Google account in Chrome, browsing related to their organization will be kept separate from their other bro...

item.title: What’s Behind Gen Z’s Sex Recession?
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, author Carter Sherman breaks down the forces shaping Gen Z's unique relationship to sex.

item.title: Our 9 Favorite Pizza Ovens: Wood, Gas, Electric, and Grill (2025)
item.description: Craving carb-y comfort? We picked our favorite outdoor ovens for backyards, countertops, or camping.

item.title: Figma’s Dylan Field will cash out about $60M in IPO, with Index, Kleiner, Greylock, Sequoia all selling, too
item.description: Figma is allowing existing shareholders to sell even more stock than the company will in its IPO.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Uber makes a bet on premium robotaxis
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.
